NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WPF.​ViewModels.​DownloadProgressWindowViewModel
WPFTemplate.​Helpers.​ChangeNotifier
public
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WPF.​ViewModels.​DownloadProgressWindowViewModel

View model for the DownloadProgressWindow (which displays downloading progress for an app update along with any error message that occurs).  This view model does not actually control the download of the NetSparkleUpdater AppCastItem.

Variables
_itemToDownload
private AppCastItem _itemToDownload
_isDownloading
private bool _isDownloading
_didDownloadAnything
private bool _didDownloadAnything
_errorMessageText
private string _errorMessageText
_isErrorMessageVisible
private bool _isErrorMessageVisible
_downloadingTitle
private string _downloadingTitle
_downloadProgressValue
private double _downloadProgressValue
_userReadableDownloadProgress
private string _userReadableDownloadProgress
_actionButtonTitle
private string _actionButtonTitle
_isActionButtonVisible
private bool _isActionButtonVisible
Functions
DownloadProgressWindowViewModel
public DownloadProgressWindowViewModel()

Default constructor for the view model that sets everything up for use

Properties
ItemToDownload
public AppCastItem ItemToDownload { get; set }

AppCastItem that is going to be downloaded.  Setting this property changes the DownloadingTitle property

IsDownloading
public bool IsDownloading { get; set }

Whether or not the app update is downloading right now or not

DidDownloadAnything
public bool DidDownloadAnything { get; set }

Whether or not the app updater was able to download anything at all (even if the download ultimately failed)

ErrorMessageText
public string ErrorMessageText { get; set }

Error message text to show to the user. Shown or not shown to the user depending on the value of IsErrorMessageVisible

IsErrorMessageVisible
public bool IsErrorMessageVisible { get; set }

Whether or not to show the ErrorMessageText to the user or not

DownloadingTitle
public string DownloadingTitle { get; set }

Title to show to the user (e.g. "Downloading...").  This property is automatically set when ItemToDownload is changed

DownloadProgress
public double DownloadProgress { get; set }

Progress for the download as a number between 0 and 100, inclusive

UserReadableDownloadProgress
public string UserReadableDownloadProgress { get; set }

A user-readable string that describes the download progress for showing to the user. This is updated via UpdateProgress(long, long, int) and shows the number of bytes downloaded out of the total number of bytes to download.

ActionButtonTitle
public string ActionButtonTitle { get; set }

Title to show on the single action button (e.g. "Cancel")

IsActionButtonVisible
public bool IsActionButtonVisible { get; set }

Whether or not the action button is visible to the user

Functions
SetFinishedDownloading
public void SetFinishedDownloading(
bool isInstallFileValid
)

Change whether or not the AppCastItem download file has finished downloading

Parameter
isInstallFileValid
bool

true if the download file has finished downloading; false otherwise

UpdateProgress
public void UpdateProgress(
long bytesReceived,
long totalBytesToReceive,
int percentage
)

Update the progress held in this view model based on the bytes that have been downloaded and the total number of bytes that need to be downloaded

Parameters
bytesReceived
long

Number of bytes that have been downloaded

totalBytesToReceive
long

Number of bytes that have to be downloaded

percentage
int

Number between 0-100 that represents how much of the download has been completed
